name: Jill Bonovitz
description: In wire I am creating the edges of what is not there; in clay, I am creating the essence of what is.

name: Lucinda Kindred
description: Textile artist inspired by Aboriginal patterns, weaving cultural stories into contemporary art.

name: Louise Strawbridge
description: Exploring the possibilities of disturbing qualities in the commonplace through varied materials and textures.

name: Writing Sos
description: Professional writing tutoring services helping writers develop their craft.
